nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 22 is the twenty-second issue of the canon comic book anthology series Star Wars Adventures. It is comprised of the stories "A Matter Of Perception," by Pierrick Colinet and Elsa Charretier, and "Tales from Wild Space: A Tauntaun Tail," by Jon Waterhouse. The issue was published on June 5, 2019 by IDW Publishing.
After losing the man she loves to a bounty hunter, Princess Leia embarks on a dangerous mission with R2-D2 and C-3PO in this exciting tale set just after The Empire Strikes Back!
